"A.D.2028/4/25/12:00": "So, you're here..."
"Ophiel Herbert!"
"Sir Ardem is up ahead. I've been ordered not to let anyone through. That's it, any questions?"
"You betrayed Mother and served Ardem... Just what are you trying to accomplish?"
"Betrayed is such a rude term. I never betrayed Mother, and I'm not serving Sir Ardem either."
"Supporting those who would guide this stagnant Earth to the next evolution... That's my only goal."
"I felt that guidance of evolution through Mother, but now I feel it within Sir Ardem. That's all there is to it."
"And if you were to show me an even greater evolutionary possibility, I would join forces with you."
"You've been spouting \"evolution this\" and \"evolution that\" like it's some religion."
"Hmph, then let's say it's for the future of Earth. Even so, it seems as if you have no desire to understand, correct?"
"Everyone is like that. Each and every person. Ignoring the current situation, never looking towards the future."
"The daily repetitive corrupt power struggles, never bothering to think back on those who were sacrificed for it."
"Even with these hands, this technology, even if you save one life, tens of thousands vanish in the same instant."
"People keep repeating the same mistakes over and over. It is a disease that cannot be healed, rotting away at the world."
"There are no more treatments. It's too late. Therefore, there's no choice but to remove the affected areas."

"……ハッ、いい年して自分の絶望を
人に押しつけてんじゃねえよオッサン。"

"無駄に頭のいい奴は一人でぐるぐる考えまくって
勝手に極論に達するから、始末に負えねえ。
なあ、ヒツギ。"
"……どうしてそこであたしに話振るのよ。"

"てめえの言い分はな、上手くいかなかったから
全部なかったことにする、っていう子供の駄々と
なんら変わりねーんだよ。"

"……ごたくはいいからそこどけオッサン。
オレたちは、てめーよりももっと子供な
神様気取りをぶん殴んなきゃいけねーんだよ。"

"まさに今のこの場こそ、世界の縮図だな。
人はこうして争いを繰り返す。
私も、君達も、人である限り……"

"領域展開……！
オフィエルさんの、能力……！"

"……いかにも。
鷲宮氷莉、君は体験したことがあったな。
我が領域は、我が意のままに繋がる。"

"……オフィエル＝ハーバート。
マザー・クラスタ、水の使徒。
そして、アースガイド北米支部長。"

"進化の先にある未来を見るために
……術式を、開始する。"
